name: Joy Reyes-Madamba
text: Question still remains why she chose BBM as VP. If it was money, then she might be offered it again when she becomes president and who knows what she will have to do if she accepts. If it was for popularity (she gets voted by Marcos loyalists), would that mean she would be indebted to the Marcoses for her win and again, what would she need to do for them when she becomes President?
